Faith is the bird that feels the light when the dawn is still dark.
Pray as though everything depended on God. Work as though everything depended on you.
Faith is taking the first step even when you don't see the whole staircase.
To one who has faith, no explanation is necessary. To one without faith, no explanation is possible.
When you focus on being a blessing, God makes sure that you are always blessed in abundance.
To have faith is to trust yourself to the water. When you swim you don't grab hold of the water, because if you do you will sink and drown. Instead you relax, and float.
Be faithful in small things because it is in them that your strength lies.
Faith consists in believing when it is beyond the power of reason to believe.
I am still far from being what I want to be, but with God's help I shall succeed.

In my deepest, darkest moments, what really got me through was a prayer. Sometimes my prayer was 'Help me.' Sometimes a prayer was 'Thank you.' What I've discovered is that intimate connection and communication with my creator will always get me through because I know my support, my help, is just a prayer away.
A casual stroll through the lunatic asylum shows that faith does not prove anything.
Faith is a living, daring confidence in God's grace, so sure and certain that a man could stake his life on it a thousand times.
Faith is not belief without proof, but trust without reservation.
We are never defeated unless we give up on God.
God, our Creator, has stored within our minds and personalities, great potential strength and ability. Prayer helps us tap and develop these powers.

Belief is a wise wager. Granted that faith cannot be proved, what harm will come to you if you gamble on its truth and it proves false? If you gain, you gain all; if you lose, you lose nothing. Wager, then, without hesitation, that He exists.
Every tomorrow has two handles. We can take hold of it with the handle of anxiety or the handle of faith.
If you have God on your side, everything becomes clear.
We are twice armed if we fight with faith.
Faith is an oasis in the heart which will never be reached by the caravan of thinking.
I die the king's faithful servant, but God's first.
Prayer should be the key of the day and the lock of the night.
Faith gives you an inner strength and a sense of balance and perspective in life.
God will never give you anything you can't handle, so don't stress.
The keys to patience are acceptance and faith. Accept things as they are, and look realistically at the world around you. Have faith in yourself and in the direction you have chosen.
Resist your fear; fear will never lead to you a positive end. Go for your faith and what you believe.
Faith is deliberate confidence in the character of God whose ways you may not understand at the time.
You were made by God and for God, and until you understand that, life will never make sense.
Seeds of faith are always within us; sometimes it takes a crisis to nourish and encourage their growth.
Faith and prayer are the vitamins of the soul; man cannot live in health without them.
Have faith in God; God has faith in you.
A man of courage is also full of faith.
We have one life; it soon will be past; what we do for God is all that will last.
That deep emotional conviction of the presence of a superior reasoning power, which is revealed in the incomprehensible universe, forms my idea of God.
I have come to the conclusion that the most important element in human life is faith.
Keep the faith, don't lose your perseverance and always trust your gut extinct.
Doubt is not the opposite of faith; it is one element of faith.
God continues to work miracles in my life.
Love, hope, fear, faith - these make humanity; These are its sign and note and character.
He who has faith has... an inward reservoir of courage, hope, confidence, calmness, and assuring trust that all will come out well - even though to the world it may appear to come out most badly.
Faithless is he that says farewell when the road darkens.
Physical strength can never permanently withstand the impact of spiritual force.
If fear is cultivated it will become stronger, if faith is cultivated it will achieve mastery.
Faith in oneself is the best and safest course.
Belief in a cruel God makes a cruel man.
I do respect people's faith, but I don't respect their manipulation of that faith in order to create fear and control.
Reason is our soul's left hand, faith her right.
Fight the good fight of faith, and God will give you spiritual mercies.
There are many things that are essential to arriving at true peace of mind, and one of the most important is faith, which cannot be acquired without prayer.
Faith is not simply a patience that passively suffers until the storm is past. Rather, it is a spirit that bears things - with resignations, yes, but above all, with blazing, serene hope.
Knowledge is only one half. Faith is the other.
I have not lost faith in God. I have moments of anger and protest. Sometimes I've been closer to him for that reason.
My reason nourishes my faith and my faith my reason.
Faith is about trusting God when you have unanswered questions.
A wise ruler ought never to keep faith when by doing so it would be against his interests.
God enters by a private door into every individual.

As your faith is strengthened you will find that there is no longer the need to have a sense of control, that things will flow as they will, and that you will flow with them, to your great delight and benefit.
In faith there is enough light for those who want to believe and enough shadows to blind those who don't.
Keep your faith in God, but keep your powder dry.
